summary: PRIOR TO THE RECALL FOR THE THROTTLE 00 V 422 000, THE PART WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY.  CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER, AND THE PROBLEM  HAS RECURRED, THE DEALERSHIP BRIARWOOD FORD; SALINE MI;734-429-5478; IS REFUSING TO HONOR THE RECALL. TS  THE RECALL WAS PREVIOUSLY REPAIRED, THEREBY MAKING IT NULL AND VOID.  THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL STICKS UNTIL ENOUGH FORCE IS APPLIED FOR THE VEHICLE TO LURCH FORWARD.  *JG
